title: PLEASE HELP FELLOW LEAGUE MEMBER! WE LOST OUR HOUSE IN A FIRE!

embed.description: Help The McNairs by Berto Contreras Lara - My best friend Nancy Diaz McNair and family recently lost their home due to a fire. Please help out this family with anything possible. It is greatly appreciated!

body: My name is Charles McNair, I'm 32 years old and I've been playing league for over 4 years. We just went through a terrible tragedy. We lost our house and everything we owned. Our garage caught fire, I immediately called 911. No one came! I sat with my 7 year old son and 12 year old daughter and we watched our house burn to the ground. Firefighters didnt show up for 30 minutes. We lost everything. I'm calling out for help from all my fellow players. I may not be the best at league or a pro but I love this game and our community. Anything would be grateful, I'm on Facebook or skype if anyone needs to contact me. Also my phone number is 8304334699, if anyone lives in the area of Seguin Texas and has any spare clothes or food anything would help at this moment. Please Share this , I don't care about anything for myself, I just want my kids to feel safe and secure. Thank you all.

I thought maybe some of my fellow friends and gamers on league might have some compassion, I've sent emails to everyone I can think of. Even to habitat for humanity. I'm trying everything,  If millions of people can spend money on digital skins , I would'nt think a dollar from a few people would hurt. I'm not trying to make any money. I just want help getting back on my feet.

And I'd like to believe you. I really would. But in all honesty, I am not a 'people person' under the best of circumstances. I just can't see why someone would come to a game forum to ask for help. Considering you have access to the internet, there are literally 100s of better options out there. And even if you have nothing else, you should be spending time with your family. They need your support more than you need ours. I {{champion:86}} tee it.

I'm am spending time with my family, All four of us are living in a 12 by 8 room in my moms trailer. I love my family more than anything in the world. I just need help. The govt gave us 800 dollars to buy ALL of us foood and clothes. What can you buy with 800 dollars nowadays. NOTHING. Thats the only help we got from the govt and they gave us a hotel for three days

This man is 32 years old, his car broke down, he hasn't been able to support his family, and now he lost this house, and most of you have the audacity to be a bit of a jerk here? (not trying to be rude either) They have nothing at all anymore... So what if he came to a game forum? He's trying to get as much help as he can to help himself, along with his family get back on their feet. He really cares about League of Legends and it's community and he's just asking for help. I would of done the same. If you have any negative comments,  *please keep them to yourself*. He kind of doesn't need any  more negativity at the moment...

Any who, I would try to maybe make a Facebook page, as well as a Go Fund Me. (http://www.gofundme.com/) I did both of those when my mother got cancer twice. I would also post on Reddit, (Seeming as how people are mostly on there) Hmm, maybe you could even try Craigslist? Not sure if that would work or not, but hey, it wouldn't hurt to try, right? But Maybe you could go to a local church for help or a Homeless Shelter (If you have no other option here) Do you or your wife have family around? I will also be keeping you and your family in my prayers. :) *If you would like help on getting your pages noticed, you can find me on Facebook; Brii Delpha.* I will help in any way that I can. I have a picture of me and my boyfriend just in case :) 

***~ May God be with you and your family.***
